prompts: Create a unique bug-type Pokemon with shiny armor and a fierce look.
Imagine a steel-type Pokemon with a knight-like appearance and a strong shield.
Show me a Pokemon that has a mix of red and silver, embodying strength and agility.
Give me a design for a Pokemon that has a shell and can burrow underground.
Generate a Pokemon that combines the traits of a knight and a bug, with sharp features.
Make a Pokemon that looks like a warrior with a metal body and a proud stance.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in forested areas and has a strong defensive mechanism.
